title: Use of systemic biofertilizers in sugarcane results in highly reproducible increments in yield and quality of harvests
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Gerardo Armando Aguado-Santacruz, Jesús Manuel Arreola-Tostado, César Aguirre-Mancilla, Edmundo García-Moya
